text: And this is, again, this is a multi page story about tweeting in a hospital bed, or just his Twitter generally.
"My intention was to tweet 'also a bigger factor on the right.'
I hit send and put my Blackberry next to me on the hospital bed and waited to fall into a deep chemically induced sleep.
For once in my life, my obsessive compulsive phone addiction worked to my advantage, as my eyes were rolling back into my head, I took one last look at my phone.
That's when I saw the email.
It was the worst mistake I could have made.
See, the 'B' key and the 'N' key right next to each other, and I have fat thumbs even when not under the influence of heavy medication.
My tweet read: '@JonathanMartin also an n-word factor on the right.'
